name: Monster Tower (itch) (zoneoutapps)
description:
Hello! welcome to our Genre Mash game submission.

The idea behind our game is a mash-up of the tower defense genre and the monster-catching genre...and a splash of accidental RTS.  Think Pokemon mixed with Balloons TD

Fair warning the levels are not balanced as much as they should be, some might be quite difficult...or a piece of cake

Different monsters require different status effects to be caught, and all of them must be at least below 50% hp.  So use the pause button to arrange your towers in the best way

We had a blast making this game and will be developing it further so think of this as a demo...a very rushed hopefully playable demo
